title: WristChat app brings the WhatsApp experience to the Apple Watch
content:
WhatsApp is one of the most popular messenger apps in the world, but when it comes to Apple platforms, it is only available for iPhone and Mac. Now, thanks to developer Adam Foot, users can finally access WhatsApp from their wrists with the new WristChat app for the Apple Watch.

moreâ€¦

The post WristChat app brings the WhatsApp experience to the Apple Watch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Apple Watch users can now have the WhatsApp experience on their wrist thanks to the new WristChat app for watchOS.
